Title: DevNest
Description: A comprehensive developer platform featuring collaborative coding environments, real-time code sharing, and integrated development tools for modern web development.

Title: Pondicherry-Publishing
Description: A modern publishing platform for Pondicherry, featuring digital content management, user-friendly interfaces, and seamless content distribution for local publishers.

Title: Snake Game
Description: A classic Snake game built with Python, featuring smooth gameplay, score tracking, and responsive controls. Perfect for demonstrating game development fundamentals.

Title: Weather Website
Description: A dynamic weather application providing real-time weather updates, forecasts, and location-based weather information with an intuitive and responsive design.
